Comment:
It cannot be snow, because the media in my country told me it never snows on the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympic sites. It can only be white propaganda falling from the sky...
Jokes and irony aside, enjoy the snow, and the Games! 🥶⛷️🏂❄️🐼🎿🥌🏒⛸️
And congratulations to the organizers for such great games and for bringing Bing Dwen Dwen to the World!
